backend_django.handlers.organizations¶

Part of Semper-KI software

Silvio Weging 2023

Contains: Handling of admin requests for organizations, api calls to auth0

backend_django.handlers.organizations.sendEventViaWebsocket(orgID, baseURL, baseHeader, eventName, args)¶
backend_django.handlers.organizations.getOrganizationName(session, orgID, baseURL, baseHeader)¶

Get Name of the Organization

Parameters:

  • orgID (str) – the id of the current organization

  • baseURL (str) – start of the url

  • baseHeader (Dict) – Header with basic stuff

Returns:

If successful, name of organization, error if not

Return type:

str or error

backend_django.handlers.organizations.sendInvite(orgID, baseURL, baseHeader, nameOfCurrentUser, withEmail, emailAdressOfUserToBeAdded)¶

Ask Auth0 API to invite someone via e-mail

Parameters:

  • orgID (str) – the id of the current organization

  • baseURL (str) – start of the url

  • baseHeader (Dict) – Header with basic stuff

  • nameOfCurrentUser (str) – Name of the user that adds people

  • emailAdressOfUserToBeAdded (str) – E-Mail adress of the user that shall be added

Returns:

If successful or not

Return type:

Bool, json or error

Ask Auth0 API to invite someone via e-mail

Parameters:

  • baseURL (str) – start of the url

  • baseHeader (Dict) – Header with basic stuff

  • orgaName (str) – Name of organization

Returns:

If successful or not

Return type:

Json or error

backend_django.handlers.organizations.deleteUserFromOrganization(orgID, baseURL, baseHeader, userMail)¶

Ask Auth0 API to delete someone from an organization via their name

Parameters:

  • orgID (str) – the id of the current organization

  • baseURL (str) – start of the url

  • baseHeader (Dict) – Header with basic stuff

  • userMail (str) – userName of person that should be deleted

Returns:

If successful or not

Return type:

True or error

backend_django.handlers.organizations.createRole(baseURL, baseHeader, roleName, roleDescription)¶

Ask Auth0 API to create a new role

Parameters:

  • baseURL (str) – start of the url

  • baseHeader (Dict) – Header with basic stuff

  • roleName (str) – name of role

  • roleDescription (str) – what the role stands for

Returns:

If successful the id or an error if not

Return type:

Dict with ID or error

backend_django.handlers.organizations.assignRole(orgID, baseURL, baseHeader, userMail, roleID)¶

Assign a role to a person

Parameters:

  • orgID (str) – the id of the current organization

  • baseURL (str) – start of the url

  • baseHeader (Dict) – Header with basic stuff

  • userMail (str) – mail adress of person that should get the role

  • roleID (str) – ID of the role for that person

Returns:

If successful or not

Return type:

True or error

  • baseURL (str) – start of the url

  • baseHeader (Dict) – Header with basic stuff

  • userMail (str) – mail adress of person

  • roleID (str) – ID of the role for that person

Returns:

If successful or not

Return type:

True or error

backend_django.handlers.organizations.editRole(orgID, baseURL, baseHeader, roleID, roleName, roleDescription)¶

Ask Auth0 API to edit a role

Parameters:

  • orgID (str) – the id of the current organization

  • baseURL (str) – start of the url

  • baseHeader (Dict) – Header with basic stuff

  • roleID (str) – ID of the role for that person

  • roleName (str) – name of role

  • roleDescription (str) – what the role stands for

Returns:

If successful true or an error if not

Return type:

Bool or error

backend_django.handlers.organizations.getRoles(orgID, baseURL, baseHeader, orgaName)¶

Fetch all roles and filter for the organization

Parameters:

  • orgID (str) – the id of the current organization

  • baseURL (str) – start of the url

  • baseHeader (Dict) – Header with basic stuff

  • orgaName (str) – Name of the organization

Returns:

If successful, list of roles for that organization, error if not

Return type:

List or error

  • baseURL (str) – start of the url

  • baseHeader (Dict) – Header with basic stuff

  • roleID (str) – ID of the role that shall be deleted

Returns:

If successful, true, error if not

Return type:

Bool or error

Add Permissions to role

Parameters:

  • orgID (str) – the id of the current organization

  • baseURL (str) – start of the url

  • baseHeader (Dict) – Header with basic stuff

  • roleID (str) – ID of the role that shall be deleted

  • listOfPermissionIDs (list) – List of permission IDs

Returns:

If successful, true, error if not

Return type:

Bool or error

Get all Permissions

Parameters:

  • orgID (str) – the id of the current organization

  • baseURL (str) – start of the url

  • baseHeader (Dict) – Header with basic stuff

Returns:

If successful, list of permissions for role as array, error if not

Return type:

JSON or error
